typeProperties.script:
source(output(
		movie as string,
		title as string,
		genres as string,
		year as string,
		Rating as string,
		{Rotton Tomato} as string
	),
	allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false) ~> source1
source1 derive(movie = toInteger(movie)) ~> DerivedColumn1
DerivedColumn1 split(length(title) <= 5,
	disjoint: false) ~> ErrorRows@(GoodRows, BadRows)
ErrorRows@GoodRows sink(input(
		name as string,
		id as integer
	),
	allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	deletable:false,
	insertable:true,
	updateable:false,
	upsertable:false,
	format: 'table',
	mapColumn(
		name = title,
		id = movie
	)) ~> sink1
ErrorRows@BadRows sink(allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	partitionFileNames:['badrows.cvs'],
	partitionBy('hash', 1)) ~> sink2
